trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la chiave di accesso per la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> associata all’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: La chiave di accesso per l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di enumerazione <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "MenuItem".
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene "MenuItem".

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'etichetta di testo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'etichetta.

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà nome può essere considerata come stringa di testo che si utilizzerebbe per spiegare il controllo viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: È importante disporre di una rappresentazione testuale per tutti i controlli di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] in modo che è possibile fare riferimento al controllo è a livello di codice in modo localizzato.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è un valore supportato; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> object.
trans-unit.target: Se si verifica uno dei seguenti casi, questo metodo restituisce l'attuale <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> che è associata a questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> ha figlio <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> does not have child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> che è associata a questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> non ha figlio <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> che è associata a questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> ha la proprietà selezionabile impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput?displayProperty=nameWithType>, questo metodo restituisce un oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: The state (expanded or collapsed) of the control.
trans-unit.target: Stato espanso o compresso del controllo.

trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: The toggle state of the control.
trans-unit.target: Stato di attivazione o disattivazione del controllo.
